TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConvertEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于格式化和取消它们通过数据绑定 Windows 窗体控件显示的值对象。The is used to format and unformat values displayed by a Windows Forms control that is bound to data through a object. 事件发生时的控件属性绑定到一个值和每当绑定的值更改时发生的事件。The event occurs whenever a control property is bound to a value and the event occurs whenever the bound value changes. 和事件使您能够创建自定义格式来显示数据。The and events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data. 例如，如果表中的数据的类型，可以指定数据应在本地货币的格式-显示通过设置的属性中的格式化值事件。For example, if the data in a table is of type , you can specify that the data should be displayed in the local currency format--by setting the property of the to the formatted value in the event. 因此必须取消它们中的显示的值事件。You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建，添加委托和事件，并使用属性将添加到的控件。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and uses the property to add the to the of a control. `DecimalToCurrencyString`添加到的事件委托事件，使用要绑定的值的格式设置方法 (类型) 为货币。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the event, uses the method to format the bound value (a type) as currency. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`添加到的事件委托事件，将由控件显示的值转换回类型。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取所需值的数据类型。

span.span: Gets the data type of the desired value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够检查的属性的值转换为的类型。The property enables you to check the type of the property that the value is being converted to. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定是否可以继续执行到另一种类型的转换。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the conversion of one type to another can proceed. `DecimalToCurrencyString`方法测试是否是一个字符串。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` method tests whether the is a string. 否则，在代码退出该方法。If not, the code exits the method. 同样，`CurrencyStringToDecimal`方法测试是否是，如果不是退出`true`。Similarly, the `CurrencyStringToDecimal` method tests whether the is a , and exits if it is not `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所包含的值属性依赖于在其中事件返回。The value contained by the property depends on the event in which the is returned. 可以在返回事件或事件。The can be returned in either the event or the event. 当中返回事件，属性包含的数据源未格式化的属性值。When the is returned in the event, the property contains the unformatted property value of the data source. 内事件，可以读取属性值、 值的格式设置和重置属性设置为新的 （格式化） 值，从而将数据绑定控件中显示的值。Within the event, you can read the property value, format the value, and reset the property to the new (formatted) value, thereby setting the value displayed in the data-bound control. 当中返回事件，该属性包含的数据绑定控件的自定义格式值。When the is returned in the event, the property contains the custom-formatted value of the data-bound control. 在事件，您必须读取带格式的值，分析它，并将其转换回数据源的数据类型相同。Within the event, you must read the formatted value, parse it, and convert it back to the same data type as the data source. 然后可以重置到未格式化的属性值，并因此设置数据源的值。You can then reset the property to the unformatted value, and thereby set the value of the data source. 若要确定数据源的类型，请检查属性值。To determine the type of the data source, examine the property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建，添加委托和事件，并使用属性将添加到的控件。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and uses the property to add the to the of a control. `DecimalToCurrencyString`添加到的事件委托事件，使用要绑定的值的格式设置方法 (类型) 为货币。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the event, uses the method to format the bound value (a type) as currency. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`添加到的事件委托事件，将由控件显示的值转换回类型。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
